metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4907 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Uninitialized Use in FFmpeg in Google Chrome prior to 108.0.5359.71 alloweda remote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
